MarkerCategory.name: se
MarkerCategory.info:
I've detected that you're using Teh's Trails with Blish HUD but you don't have scripts enabled.
In order to properly use the waypoint system you must turn scripting on.
Pathing Module Settings -> Script Options -> Enable Lua Scripts Then reload markers to remove this popup
Alternatively, if you wish to use the legacy system, you must enable it in the Map Completion -> Common Markers category

POI.info:
Route 1 -> If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
Route 2 -> If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon from the edge
Jump before the fence
Don't try to griffon superdive
Immediately leave both instances
Don't try to griffon superdive
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
You can also use ground targeted teleports instead of bunny
If you don't have skyscale with rift repair mastery follow trail of shame
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
If you suck at griffon don't superdive
Save your bond of vigor
Run over skritt traps with any mount, Kill skritt
Kill all | Throw shards/weapons at ghosts/branded -> kill them
Use flamethrower
Destroy noxious branded plants and branded
Kill inquest and their stuff

Interact along the path -> kill at the end
Use stealth if you can
Kill seperatists and destroy siege
Kill Harpies (Matriarchs give the most %) and nests

Talk to heart (2) -> kill grawls (skill 1 and 2), Interact supplies, branches and unformed elementals
Use bundle to weaponswap animations
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon from the highest point
Fix nets, use fish (skill 1) to lure Drakes into capture area
Kill structures and ogres
Kill bandits, take and turn in explosives, destroy supplies

Portal to end 5x
Stack Swiftness (preferably with speed runes) -> Stealth interact flags along the heart trail
Fix pet houses, return later to fix them again. Otherwise put chickens back
Reclaim event up -> Kill ogres and pets
Kill ogres, flags and supplies
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon
Interact along the path while killing ghosts

Kill Dredge (not veterans) and machinery
Event -> Kill walls

Kill Azalus, Kill Inebriated soldiers (apply some conditions for 2x progress), Be a waiter
Event -> Kill bandits, dredge

1st time here -> Pick up mines -> Continue on trail
2nd time here -> Pick up mines (finishing the heart) -> Map done
if you have stealth use it
Kill Separatists and their structures

1st time here -> Do emotes at cows and wash them -> Continue on trail
2nd time here -> Do emotes at cows and wash them again (finishing the heart) -> TP to arrow
Talk to lazy miners, interact rock piles | Fill holes, kill Dredge
Destroy machinery | kill ghosts
Water plants
If you don't have rewinder, unlock the waypoint ahead first so you can teleport to it from underground
Prepare a stunbreak skill or stability
Kill Skale, Flame Legion, interact and turn in water testing kits, interact dispensers
Only deposit here if Darkshield is not accepting kits
If Darkshield is busy, go to the other deposit icon

Talk to Dahala -> feed hay to cow, repeat
Event -> Water trough, bring chickens in, kill separatists
You need to stand behind the line for the trebuchet to count
You need to stand behind the line for the trebuchet to count
If you fail bond of faith -> keep jumping with the springer right below the vista as sometimes you will get dismounted late, allowing you to get to the top
You need to stand behind the line for the trebuchet to count

Kill Separatists, interact with suspicious piles
Trebuchet event -> Destroy Trebuchet (make sure you are in heart range)
Interact trees twice (with weaponswap) -> burn branch
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon
Talk to 2 skelk -> When they start logging, alternate talking to both of them
Spam flame font with full inventory

Duel trainees (stack conditions)
No Trainees -> repair turrets and kill skritt
Interact with water samplers and capacitors, kill Branded
Kill bandits, griffons, wolves, branded
Kill Branded, Interact with crystals

Weaponswap doors and interact with posters along the trail
Event -> Kill separatists
Weaponswap rocks and lazy miners, kill skritt and bats
Kill Renegades and Separatists, weaponswap mortar shells
Interact with wasp nests and barrels, kill wasps
Spam interact battle plans with full inventory
Turn in Pieces of Charr Scrap Metal
If you don't have skyscale use bunny -> griffon
Train the soldiers and disgruntled charr (stack conditions)
Kill cows, ogres and their pets, Interact with food supplies
Stack conditions on Irate Bulls
Kill harpies and their eggs
Kill Plants -> Gather pricklesberries, then turn them in, Kill wargs

Kill cave creatures, weaponswap truffles
Not enough -> bring truffles to warthogs
Turn in barracuda meat

Grab grenades from heart (1, 1, 1) and kill anything you see
If you run build with low damage keep the grenades for as long as you can
If you have glide boost use it as well
Don't try to griffon superdive
Interact along the path
Kill Flame Legion and embers, disable power sources (prepare stunbreak)
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon
Kill Flame Legion and embers, interact leaks and power sources (prepare stunbreak)
Kill Flame Legion - Ignitors give most %
Kill Flame Legion, turrets and founts, interact with emblems
Interact with concentrated tar along the path

Interact tar bubbles -> kill flame legion/tar elementals, duel soldiers
Event -> Kill embers and flame legion

Talk to prisoners -> stack conditions on any that turn aggressive
Otherwise -> Stand on top of vein -> spam f -> throw rocks to forge -> pick up ingots from furnace-> talk to guard (3% per ingot)

Kill Flame Legion, embers, elementals, shrines
Not enough -> Return later
Rubble, kill flame legion
Kill and pillage Flame Legion
If the gate is closed use trail of shame
Kill Flame Legion
If you cannot rewind -> TP to square
Kill thiefs and hatchlings, feed queen couple times -> interact eggs, turn in
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
Interact with weapon parts along heart trail, later step on mines and interact with banners
If you don't have skyscale do bunny into griffon from the rock

Kill Branded
If you don't have the waypoint unlocked -> TP to arrow (Town of Cowlfang) and follow trail of shame, then go backwards
Kill separatists and destroy their equipment
Interact with beacons, kill branded and crystals
If you don't have the WP unlocked -> follow trail of shame
Use cannonball on cannon -> throw chunks of wall into water
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon
Kill branded, interact with spearguns -> talk to fish

Kill ghosts, ghost spiders, talk to spirits
Bria event -> Kill her minions (DO NOT kill her)
Kill skritt and use the cannons
Interact and kill
If you don't have skyscale use bunny to scale up and then bunny to griffon from the top
Interact and kill Flame Legion
Destroy artifacts and kill ghosts
Interact all, kill ooze and rats

Follow the trail VERY closely here
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
Interact and kill drakes
Kill ghosts and interact with casks and torches
Interact and kill Flame Legion
Interact and kill Flame Legion
If you don't have skyscale or if you need HP follow trail of shame

Duel Braggarts (stack conditions) and talk to Loafers
Not enough -> Follow path and later squish sacs and kill spiders

Talk to heart (2, 1). Get Moa under 50% health and repeatedly capture it (skill 4).
If arena works, you can kill mobs.
Kill harpies and nests
Kill ghosts
Kill ghosts, destroy walls

Talk to heart (1, 2) -> Grenades on dummies
Not enough -> Interact with machines
Interact with everything and kill Separatists
Kill skelk, pick up eggs and food, turn in
Kill and pillage ogres
If the gate is closed due to the event follow trail of shame with skyscale/springer
Interact and kill

Kill skelk, centaurs and rock dogs
Not enough -> Grab medkit -> revive seraph -> use medkit on them
Kill rock dogs and Harathi, destroy food bowls

Challenge all brawlers (stack conditions - not necessary if enough)
Centaurs in control: Night -> go north of vista -> talk to fallen + interact tomb of the fallen Day -> Kill centaurs or come back later
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon

Follow heart trail to talk to Lazy/Daydreaming Farmers + interact wasp nests
Not enough farmers -> Kill grubs/wasps/pirates
Kill pirates, chicken, rescue villagers

Spam Pirate Plans with full inventory
Weaponswap to cancel animation, Stay behind tent to avoid combat
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon from the top of building

Repeatedly talk to the same servant
Be really fast otherwise he despawns
Fight in Ring - Hard is fastest

Kill dredge
Not enough -> take mining supplies -> Interact burrow + Interact vein -> bring ore to heart
Interact traps, bring food to heart
Interact with torches and debris, kill ghosts

Feed livestock, Give meal to heart, duel Duchen, kill Harathi and bandits
Do not forget Vista
Kill harpies, clean up skritt
Kill bandits, spiders, prisons, turrets, Interact with cocoons -> Kill hatchlings
1st flight -> Once you dive be ready to immediately pull back up
If you failed to pull up with griffon, just rewind back and try again (if you have cooldown on rewinder swap builds to skip CD)
Interact with crab traps and leaky barrels, kill rockslides

Kill centaurs, rock dogs and weapon racks
If no centaurs to kill -> Come back later or kill weapon racks and collect badges to turn in at heart
Kill Harathi

Kill centaur, supplies and trebuchet
Event -> Do it

Interact fire -> Interact lumber piles, Weaponswap slaves, Kill centaurs and rock dogs
There is usually one huge group of centaurs patrolling the entire heart area

Kill everything
If no centaurs to kill -> Come back later or kill objects around the camp and collect badges to turn in at heart
Duel mercenaries
This trail marks the edge of the heart zone. You can kill Harathi while standing in the zone
This trail marks the edge of the heart zone. You can kill Harathi while standing in the zone
This trail marks the edge of the heart zone. You can kill Harathi while standing in the zone

Weaponswap unexploded shots, interact with spike traps, kill Harathi
Camp has Harathi -> Kill them all
Otherwise return here at the end of the map to interact with unexploded shots again
Kill Risen
This trail marks the edge of the heart zone. You can kill Harathi while standing in the zone
Kill and plunder Harathi
This trail marks the edge of the heart zone. You can kill Harathi while standing in the zone
Waypoint to Heart if you haven't finished one heart, otherwise the map is done
POI.copy: [&BBAEAAA=], or if still missing one heart: [&BAMAAAA=]

POI.info: Kill and plunder bandits
Turn in Seraph Badges
Turn in Crab Meat

Kill skale and Togatl (no veterans)
Not enough -> continue on path to kill grubs and ettins in cave
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon
Waypoint contested -> Beetle back
Kill hostile underwater life, check traps, cleanse poison
Scare rabbits, Interact with wurm mounds -> Kill wurms, kill all pests

Kill Tamini, destroy harathi flags and spike traps
Event -> do it
Take explosives and explode them on arrow marker (be very precise for 15% progress), Kill ettin, bait rabbits
Kill and plunder bandits
Interact and kill destroyers | Turn in volcanic rocks
Kill river drakes and bandits
Kill bandits, Interact with feed

Weaponswap spider eggs and trees, Kill spiders and bats
Keep your camera on the ground to see anything
If you don't have skyscale use griffon
Kill drakes, eggs and skale, Interact with traps
Weaponswap corn, Talk to cows, Interact with mounds and kill wurms
Interact with leaks and rocks, kill everything
Take sword -> DO NOT target sergeant -> Wait till she lowers shield -> Press 1 towards her repeatedly from the marked spot
Do not miss the first POI
Kill centaurs, destroy stuff
Interact and kill all
Kill centaurs and their weapons, Interact with trinkets and dirt

Kill Skritt, interact with shinies
Not enough -> Continue, then interact wasp nests, kill wasps
If you don't have skyscale use griffon

Follow heart trails to kill portals + shades and aatxe, talk to tortured spirits to spawn shades
Not enough -> Come back later
Follow the trail to resume completing this heart
Kill boars and spiders

Kill centaurs, pull + kill grubs, talk to Liz (spam 1)
Come back later to finish heart

Answer Ettins
Do not forget POI
Waypoint to square if you need to finish the monastery heart
Kill skale, armored fish, bring crabs close to cage -> interact
Kill Tamini
Interact with hidden children, wasp nests, graffiti

Kill everything
Don't forget PoI
If the path is blocked follow trail of shame

Spam relics with full inventory
Weaponswap to cancel animations

Interact Battle Orders, Talk to Reluctant Bandits, Use skill 4 on arrow markers
Use bundle to weaponswap animations
Kill everything, Interact documents and deposit them to Corporal

Interact with monitors
You will finish this heart later down the path
Answer lattice questions
SLOW DOWN BEFORE THE DROP

Answer correctly, Kill ghosts and bandits, pick up baneberries
Not enough -> Follow heart trail at the end to deposit baneberries
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon
Rewind back by swapping build templates
Kill Inquest and weaponswap spy receivers
Kill bandits and their structures
Kill skelks and interact with junk piles

Kill hylek and interact mud wallows, interact all ooze puddles -> kill oozes
Not enough -> deposit ooze ball at processor
Kill destroyers
Kill grubs, later deposit their meat
Kill Nightmare court, Interact all -> Kill
Go at +-70% speed on beetle
Kill bandits, Interact bushes -> Kill
Kill Nightmare court and jungle wurms, Interact all
If you're doing hero points and the center was closed, make sure to go back and get the hero points there.

Kill grubs and choking vines
Not enough -> Talk to heart (1, 1) -> Spread pollen at marks, Interact with everything
Use executioner axe (or other bundle) to move faster and to weaponswap animations
WP contested or you got hit -> Go and beetle back to waypoint
Weapon swap spider sacs and kill everything
Interact with larvae -> kill mosquitoes
Kill Nightmare Court, talk to prisoners, interact thorns
Turn in Caledon Lavender
Kill spiders and Nightmare Court, Interact with webs and pods
Kill wave riders, Repair fish nets and crab traps

Kick Trees
Not enough -> Kill larva
Interact with everything and kill Skritt
Interact with hands and territory markers, Kill Risen
Talk to pups and lost hounds (1), kill mosquitoes
Kill spiders, Interact webs and sacs, Use Redcap -> interact with nests (use raptor 1 to kill during stun)

Kill Risen, Interact with corpses
No risen -> Follow heart trail
Destroy cells and kill Krait
Kill Risen (lake), interact with corpses and grub holes
Turn in Hylek Armor
Interact with lanterns and crawfish traps | Kill urchins and Risen
Destroy cells and kill Krait (Krait Slavers give most %)
Talk to heart(1,1,1) -> Talk to NPCs (all 1), interact with briars and weak points, Challenge duelists
Find a Concerned Skritt Forager with rock -> repeatedly talk spam 1

Talk to Suspicious Salvage Specialists -> kill
Not enough -> follow heart trail -> kill all + interact danger signs behind gate
Weaponswap chaos shards (need stunbreak), kill everything (no veterans)
Interact with control panel (1, 1) -> stack conditions on golem

Talk to IQ Test Subjects (spam 1), talk to captivated skritt -> kill (can repeat when regenning), Interact monitors
Don't forget PoI

Interact Apparatuses (ignore enemies), Talk to impressionable progenies
Mosquito Event -> Kill mosquitoes

Kill dragonflies and skelk Event -> Kill cuatl
Don't forget WP
Interact generators, Kill spark -> interact tank

Kill Crazed Hyleks (they change randomly) and Inquest, Interact with ampoules
Hylek boss Event -> Kill all crazed hyleks around, then kill boss
Interact and kill everything

Kill ooze and containers
Event -> Kill oozes/boss
Talk to heart (1, 1, 1) -> interact with distortions only
Keep following heart trail to repeatedly: talk to projections -> kill oozes

Kill Inquest and destroy equipment
Not enough -> Finish it later on the path

Kill Skritt, collect gate pieces
Event -> turn in gate pieces at Parnna

Kill Hylek and turrets
Boss event -> Kill boss
If you haven't finished inquest killing heart -> complete it here
If you can't rewind back -> backtrack with beetle to first rewinder marker
If you followed the order of maps you should be all done. Congratulations!
If you cannot rewind -> TP to Heart and follow trail of shame
Be ready to glide when you get dismounted near vista
If you don't have skyscale -> Follow trail of shame
If you are fast enough you can swap from skimmer directly to skyscale on water
If you cannot rewind follow trail of shame
Waypoint or rewind
This waypoint contested -> Use Rewinder
If you don't have skyscale: Follow trail of shame
If waypoint contested, use jade waypoint
If you cannot rewind TP to swirl, then follow trail of shame
Place Jade WP in case waypoint gets contested
Waypoint or rewind
Do not miss POI
If you don't have skyscale use bunny->griffon
If you cannot rewind TP to star
Teleport by touching glass. If you cannot -> follow trail of shame
Don't touch the glass or you will be teleported
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
If you cannot rewind or don't have hero points: TP to heart and follow 1st trail of shame
If you cannot rewind TP to heart and follow 2nd trail of shame
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame

Using bond of Vigor dash 4 times with skyscale to get as much height as possible.
When you get dismounted immediately start gliding towards the vista
If you cannot rewind follow trail of shame
If you're slow -> swap to beetle
Kill Svanir, Interact with markers
Use stealth if you can
Kill Svanir, Icebrood
Use skill 3 (bubble) on markers. Stand behind turrets to avoid getting knocked back
Take shield from priory supply crate -> Get vista and PoI -> Then use skill 3 on markers near turrets
Build snowmen, kill Svanir

Emotes on Impressionable Skritt, kill spiders
Event -> kill phantoms and spiders
Destroy turrets -> use dropped explosives on gates
Careful: Shrine at 2nd PoI has invisible barrier. Don't go too close
Interact with weapon caches and ores that you'll deposit to ore grinder
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
Kill Svanir and Icebrood
Destroy equipment, disarm mines, kill dredge
Kill spiders, interact with cocoons

Answer tombstone questions
Defense event -> come back later or kill dredge

If heart almost done -> pick up mines (don't go too close near them)
Otherwise -> WP here later to kill cannons again
Quaggan lanterns and shark baits, train with quaggan
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
Kill Icebrood
Follow heart trail to: talk to Koda, interact shrines and books

These NPC's occasionally switch places.
Freezing Steps - 3 Distant Oracle - 2

Interact with cracks, bring Fish to Hungry Kodan, talk to Tired Kodan
Icebrood took over -> Kill them
Do not forget waypoint
Weaponswap 9 Kodan Supplies, then turn in
Kill Svanir, destroy crystals
Kill Svanir, interact with cages and banners
Careful not to hit the icicles during flight
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame

Kill imps, gather and turn in summoning stones (3% per), interact aetherometer
Talk to Kazk to spawn more imps
Don't try to griffon superdive
If you cannot rewind follow trail of shame
If you don't have skyscale just bunny to griff here
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
Kill Icebrood, destroy ice
Kill grawl, torch supplies and explosives
If you're doing hero points WP to X

Follow heart trail to kill cannons
If tons of players are nearby -> Talk to heart -> Kill dredge, Inspire near sympathizer + worker, Interact ground -> Talk to dredge, Talk to skritt -> again in 3 sec
If you don't have skyscale or if you mess up during flight follow trail of shame
Kill pirates, loot their rum, turn it in, burn flags, destroy turrets
Kill rats (can use raptor 1 to AoE), talk to lazy miners
Interact and kill ettin
Feed dolyaks, herd them, kill wurms (big wurms give 2x)
Use glide boost as well if you have it

Kill pirates, destroy turrets
Pirates friendly -> Come back later or follow the trail for loot (90% of heart)
Interact and kill grawl
Use griffon if the bridge is missing

Use testing apparatus (use a matching element on each imp)
Nothing to use apparatus on -> interact portals with coagulator and kill imps
Interact + kill skritt
First flight -> You get dismounted near waypoint, so try to fly low, otherwise gravity will do its job

Interact 2x each fence, pour water on passed out drunks, kill arctodus and elementals
If heart still not done -> Distribute Food + Drinks and fight rowdy customers
Interact and kill Dredge
Interact with spider eggs and kill spiders
Kill steam creatures, collect steam parts, interact with aetheric observers
If you don't have skyscale use griffon
Grab and turn in defense plans, kill Dredge
Poke rocks, destroy burrows, kill destroyers
Don't try to griffon superdive
Kill Jotun and wurms

Repeatedly talk to one Wounded Seraph
No wounded Seraph -> Come back later

Kill Dredge
No Dredge -> Come back later
Kill Svanir and Icebrood (no veterans)
Kill Modniir
Kill arctoduses till 50% -> turn in at chef (1, 1)
Take 4 Stolen elixirs, turn them in, kill at least 4 grawl
Kill jellyfish (Stinging give more), Interact kelp
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon and follow trail of shame
Kill Icebrood and wolves, do event at Njordstead if it is up
If the event here is up, do it
Kill Icebrood and animals
Kill wolves and jotun
Kill Icebrood
If you don't have skyscale use bunny to climb up higher and griffon from there
Interact all, kill bats, icebrood and skelk, talk to rabbits
Use stealth in the cave if you can
Open cages, kill wolves, leopards and icebrood

Kill Dredge and turrets
If there are no dredge -> return later
Ore event -> do it

Kill Svanir, Icebrood, roadblocks, griffon and minotaur
There are more enemies around the keep
Make sure to pick the next PoI during flight
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame
Talk to heart to transform -> Talk to cubs -> Skill 4 -> Talk to them again

Kill rock dogs or do trades (heart trail should guide you): Rabbit hole -> Trugg Loose ore -> Trugg Metal bar(near Trugg) -> Jokull Armor(near Jokull) -> Kakifein Cage(near Kakifien) -> Grokor Barrel(near Grokor) -> Trugg -> give to heart
Kill Svanir, destroy banners, weaponswap wolf cages

If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon
Make sure to take the next PoI during flight

Cull skelk
Turn in raven eggs in any nest
Pick up the rabbit food -> drop it -> scare the rabbit away -> repeat
Kill Svanir and Icebrood
Kill Icebrood, Svanir and their structures
Choose a kid, proceed to hate them with every snowflake of your snowball, throw the ball so hard they fall on the ground, throw again for maximum satisfaction
Weaponswap traps, kick trees, kill Svanir, duel acolytes, erase tags
Talk 3x with each calf -> kill skelk that spawn after capture
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame

Catching kegs works -> Catch kegs and give them to Hodir (sometimes standing slightly ahead of the indicated zone works)
Otherwise -> Kill wurms, Wake up passed out warriors with water, take kegs from cave -> give them to Hodir, do wurm egg event

Kill wolves, corrupted ice and banners
Not enough enemies -> Kill Svanir And Icebrood
Interact and kill grawl
Kill couple fireflies -> deposit essences at alchemy table

Interact Quaggans, Kill skale, Kill groups of crows with AoE (Raptor 1)
Not enough -> continue on the trail and return right after picking up PoI
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon from above

Interact with capacitors, kill containment cells
Not enough -> Kill Inquest
Kill risen and orrian fish, Bring weapons to Braze Lonetracker (1, 1)
Turn in Cursed Pirate Artifacts
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon
Keep closed -> Follow trail of shame
Kill skale, Feed domesticated crab, Interact Hole -> Bring crab home

If you have skyscale -> Dash 4x (with bond of vigor) or dash 2x and use jade bot glider T3
Otherwise -> follow trail of shame

Turn in Pirate Outfits
Event -> come back later or kill mobs
Kill Risen and destroy dredge tech
Kill marsh drakes each time you WP here
Turn in Skritt Artifacts
If you don't have skyscale follow trail of shame

Kill buccaneers, cannons and supplies
Not enough -> Interact everything
Slow down before cave
Create potions with ingredients: 1: Fern, Coral, Mushroom 2: Vine, Coral, Mushroom Deposit each to Cesseila -> Interact cage -> Kill spider
Fight pirates (stack conditions), throw rum
Grab a scanner -> Mark all sites (skill 3) -> Collect artifacts from all sites -> turn them in | kill spiders and wurms

Kill Risen
Build with low damage -> Take grenade kit -> group up risen -> throw all grenades to one spot and kite risen into it
Duel 2 disgruntled vigils (stack conditions), Weaponswap orrian corpse -> Kill Risen maggot
Spar with skritt | Condi Stack for instant heart completion
Turn in Volcanic Earth Elemental Core

If you don't have rewinder -> use jade bot waypoint
If you don't have anything -> After getting to bottom of volcano -> Follow trail of shame from star
Turn in Special Roots to Drysdan event
If you don't have skyscale -> use griffon
Turn in Supplies
Fun fact: Jackal teleports where you look, not where you go. That means you can teleport backwards
Kill Krait (no veteran), blood idols and turrets underwater, interact cages
Once you collect hero point -> beetle under path
Turn in Alpha/Beta Inquest Control Key
Once you collect hero point -> beetle/skimmer under path
Get duster from Vanna and dust crystals
Interact with waste and recording device, kill magically infused tuna and Inquest
tp to arrow, take launcher, drop to water to get poi and heart
Talk to heart(1,1,1) -> spam skill 1 with full inventory near a chest

Interact nets and chum buckets, Kill krait
Not enough -> Bring eggs to heart
Kill risen or bring mines to heart (25% each)

Follow heart trail to interact scanners and talk to heart(1,1) -> use skill 4 on enemy out of range, channel skill 5 (prepare condi cleanse/tank build)
Come back later to do the same
Defense Event -> Kill krait
If you don't know how to do jackal launch use griffon

Interact turret -> throw at hidden termite larva -> repeat couple times -> interact grub tails -> kill all, Duel hunters
Swap between turret types to not wait for CDs (wait till shot lands)
Interact with fish corpse, interact (or bring to heart) stumps, kill basilisks and risen

Talk to heart (1,1) -> walk over 16 flies -> bring them to the heart
Event -> Kill risen
slow down
Follow heart trail to interact -> deposit at heart (Brannen - revive him if dead)
Follow heart trail to interact with everything
Grab flamethrower and burn weeds (you get progress 2x with quickness)

If event is up, kill Risen for quick progress
Otherwise, duel wardens (stack conditions), Kill risen, skale and trolls, fix hylek region markers

Interact markers, interact potion set -> use on risen, Take wood to heart
Event -> Kill Risen

Kill ambient creatures, trolls and nightmare court
Inquest Event -> Do it
If you don't have skyscale use bunny into griffon from one of the buildings
If you haven't finished the experimental weapon heart -> WP to square, otherwise you are done
POI.bh-info: If you haven't finished the experimental weapon heart -> WP to Splintered Coast Waypoint, otherwise you are done

POI.info:
Weaponswap kegs and toast/boast
Event -> Kill drunk skritt
Get staff from Bizz(1, 1) -> spam skill 2 near the same fissure

Event -> Kill risen
No event -> Return later (via triangle WP) or collect artifacts
POI.bh-info:
Event -> Kill risen
No event -> Return later (via Gyre Rapids WP) or collect artifacts

POI.info: Talk to heart(1, 2) -> burn risen eruption (you get progress 2x with quickness), Interact with banners

Burn corpses, kill risen
Defense event -> Kill risen spawned by the event
If square contested -> WP to star (White Paper WP) and beetle there
POI.bh-info: If red is contested, go to blue and beetle there

POI.info:
Interact with poles, return metal bars to scrap barrels
Skritt killable -> Kill all
Interact with torches and weaponswap traps
Kill champion krait witch near vista or kill krait and free prisoners
Make and test potions and elixirs, kill big wurms and river drakes, bring mysterious plants to heart
Weaponswap food, destroy totems and cages, kill grawl
If you skipped the heart -> TP to triangle
POI.bh-info: If you skipped the heart -> TP to Gyre Rapids Waypoint

POI.info: Kill dredge and destroyers, weaponswap ore and boreholes
Answers: 1. Lab genius 2. I am not in charge 3. Necromancy and golemancy 4. We embody magic
Take red waypoint
Take blue waypoint
Range highly recommended. Focus the two archers first, then the champion. If the bladedancer gets close, he can deal significant damage with a chain CC attack.
CC highly recommended. Focus the Heal-o-Tron's whenever they spawn.
Focus any menders first, then the smaller mobs, then the veteran

CC is a must. At 25% HP, she will perform a life-drain skill that will regen a large amount of HP, breaking her defiance bar to prevent her from healing back up is key. Try to stay behind her to avoid most of her damage.
If it's nighttime and choppers are up, you can waypoint back to the previous WP (shrouded ruins) and take that chopper after getting this point of interest.
Combat HP | Guano can be very challenging due to being a champion and her regen mechanics. Not recommended to solo.
Two Commune HPs back to back
If you mess up this dive, just follow the HP trail
Combat HP | Soloable with most builds
Commune HP | Nunoch Wallow mastery required to continue following trail
If you crash here, you can use the updraft on the ship to get back on trail
Commune HP
Combat HP | Golem is a champion mob thus it's not recommended to attempt to solo
Two Commune HP's back to back
Combat HP | The Coztic Bladedancer is a champion and thus it's not recommended to attempt to solo
This area only opens after doing the first part of the pylon events here
Place personal jade waypoint here
Use teleporter and then immediately come back
Boat around to get HP and PoI, rescuing villagers and hitting debris along the way, then finish by catching ~10 Shinota Blackfin and turning in to the Hall Director or killing Aetherblade
Teleport to the waypoint you placed
Do one lap of obstacle course, then combo girl, then defiance bar, then do either dodge or painting until complete
Purchase Haiju Minnow's from heart NPC. Fish and turn in Daijun Blackfins.
All done here! Go back to Arborstone to start Echovald

Doors can bug out and stack -- spam F on the doors and if you're lucky there will be enough stacked to insta-complete the heart. If you're not, kill the purists and deposit the item in one of the shrines marked on the map. Pathing takes you to the first one because it's on the way to the next set of doors anyways. Flying into ravens with skyscale will give some easy completion too. Don't bother with grubs.
Place Personal Waypoint
Teleport to the waypoint you placed
If you mess up dive, just beetle under path
This griffon path goes through somewhat tight areas, may be worth using rewinder here as a backup for your first time. Try not to pull up until the power plant doors.
No easy way to complete this heart sadly. Get on raptor, check which generators you have marked on your map, deliver boxes to them.

Somewhat technical griffon path. Bond of Vigor helps. You fly quite close to the ground near the waypoint and pull up sharply at the end. If you mess it up, you can follow underneath and skyscale up the wall using the buildings on the right side.
If you fail to pull up all the way, use the buildings on the right to skyscale up the wall
Use bot to get PoI up top, then return. Then spam the zipline (F -> X to dismount) to quickly complete heart.
You're done! Go to Promenade Waypoint and then go southeast to the portal in the water to begin Seitung trail
Open your portal on marker, talk to NPC and get disguised, then take portal
Steal jade tech, plant on guards by pillars when no one is looking.
Bait single patrol to here and kill them out of sight of any guards to complete heart.

If you have portal: Place portal here, drop down to get HP, then drop off to get kicked out.
If you don't have portal: Drop and get HP, then skyscale back up and place rewinder. Then drop and get disguised, pull rewinder back out, and rewind.
Talk to NPC, use skill to hit pillars as you float around.
Go out by zipline to lose diguise.
Grab battery if you have less than 2 charges
Grab battery if you have less than 2 charges
Grab battery if you have less than 2 charges
This dive is somewhat technical. After pulling up at the tree, be careful to avoid the spires on the archway. If you fail somewhere, just follow underneath with skyscale
You must kill the NPC here to activate the teleporter and get the PoI. Occasionally bugs out.
Talk to NPC to get disguise
Grab battery if you have no charges
Place personal waypoint
Teleport to personal waypoint
If you fail this griffon dive, you can use the zipline
If you fail this griffon dive, you can just use skimmer or skiff and follow underneath
Depending on what is up either: fish, spice, and firewood OR sapling, arrowhead, and feathers, combine at spot marked on map and give to NPC. Saplings are north of waypoint just outside village.
If this is your first time, you must complete the Cryptseeker achievement first, then come back.
You're done! Go to Jade Gate waypoint and head east to begin DE trail
Beware the cherry blossom tree near shrine, dont get caught on branches
Don't miss this PoI! You have to hit the wall to get it

Stop! Two things before you continue past this waypoint: 1) Your personal waypoint must be off cooldown 2) Meta cannot be happening.
If you must, come back later. It'll just be a waste of time if you try and do it.

This rewind timing can be tight if you aren't fast. Keep an eye on the buff as you fly. If it starts to blink, use Bond of Faith to quickly dismount and rewind.
You can always retry the glide, getting back up here from the ground is a pain.
Place personal waypoint

The first path here uses an out of bounds mechanic to return you back to this spot, it is key that you do not touch the ground.
The second path uses rewinder, you'll need to be quick on opening the vista and dropping down to get the waypoint before rewinding.
Again, you can always rewind and try again. Getting back up is a pain.
Teleport to your personal waypoint
All done! Congrats!
The Echovald Wilds path starts through this portal
New Kaineng City path starts through this portal
TehsTrails Map Comp starts here and goes NKC -> SP -> TEW -> DE. Good luck!

Teh's Lantern Trail starts here!
Please note, there is no trail that leads to the Aetherblade Refuge Lantern, as it is locked behind the Aetherblade meta event. You'll need to light that lantern on your own.
Place your personal waypoint here
Teleport to your personal waypoint
Be careful not to miss the bridge with the next beetle drift
If not contested, waypoint
Place personal waypoint
Teleport to the waypoint you placed
Rewinder is faster than waypointing, but if you'd rather, you can waypoint back. If the waypoint is contested, you must use rewinder.

TEW Lantern Trail starts here.
Please note, there is no trail leading to the two lanterns inside Aspenwood Research Facility, as they are locked behind the meta event. You must get those lanterns on your own.
You will also need to have unlocked the story step 'Empty' with the character you are on in order to get to the lantern in Secret Cavern. The trail does lead to this lantern, but you may choose to come back and get it after.
Go up with skyscale first, place rewinder mark at top, then drop down and get disguised. Pull rewinder back out and rewind to top.
Place rewinder mark and drop down to get disguised
An npc will spawn here that must be killed to gain access. Lantern is in the last room. Second room you have to kill mobs to get the key.
Place personal waypoint here

You must switch your active story to EoD Ch. 10 'Empty' to get in here.
If you cannot do that on this character, return to the Jade WP you placed and come back later on another character.
Teleport to your personal waypoint
If the waypoint is contested, skimmer to the other side
If the waypoint is contested or you are caught in combat, use the zipline just outside the cave

DE Lantern Trail begins here.
Do not attempt to run the second half of the trail when the meta is happening
There are several batteries which appear/disappear depending on the progress of the map. If the battery you are meant to interact with is not there, you will need to look around and locate another.
The trail does not lead to the Jade Wind's Respite lantern as it is meta-locked. You will need to get it on your own after a succesful meta.
Place personal waypoint here
Teleport to your personal waypoint
Place your personal waypoint
Teleport to your personal waypoint
Waypoint to The Echovald Wilds to continue the trail
It's important that you don't mess this dive up
Head to Jade Quarry Waypoint in DE for the last trail
